content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --STDY
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --ENDY
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --STDY
      operator: greater_than
      value: --ENDY
Core:
  Id: FDA.VALIDATOR.SD0012
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: --STDY must be equal to, or prior to, --ENDY
Outcome:
  Message: --STDY is after --ENDY
  Output Variables:
    - --STDY
    - --ENDY
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: FDA
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: FDA Validator Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: SD0012, Publisher ID FDAB034
              Version: '1'
            Version: '1.5'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Study Day of Start of Event, Exposure or Observation
                  (--STDY) must be less or equal to Study Day of End of Event, Exposure
                  or Observation (--ENDY).
                Document: FDA Validator Rules v1.5
                Section: Rules
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
      - EVENTS
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - CO
      - DM

json.Description: --STDY must be equal to, or prior to, --ENDY

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Study Day of Start of Event, Exposure or Observation (--STDY) must be less or equal to Study Day of End of Event, Exposure or Observation (--ENDY).
